item.description:
Let's Go Skiing or Riding!! Wednesday, Jan. 11th. 9am.

Cannon Mountain

Franconia Notch, NH

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

Carpooling from Nashua & Hooksett NH. $36 NH.Resident Wednesdays

Every Wednesday, non-holiday, New Hampshire Residents can purchase a lift ticket for just $36!
Proof of NH residency required. One ticket per Wednesday per resident. Not valid: 12/28/11 Steve O. wrote:     I have been waiting for the snow to come, and I can wait no longer. So, please take the day off, and join me, and my friends, for a day of skiing or riding. We ski and ride at any level. Skiing and riding weekdays are the best way to go. The parking lots, the lodges, and the trails are almost empty. So, we don't have to park and carry our equipment miles away from the lodge. We don't have to fight for a seats, or to walk in the lodge. We have it to our selves, and the trails too. Plus, there is usually little to no lift lines. So, weekdays we ski and ride. We get so much more for our money and our time, than the weekends.     I will be carpooling from exit 8 in Nashua, & exit 10 off of rt.93 in Hooksett NH.. If you can't make it to ride up with us? Then meet us their. Tuesdays & Thursdays 2-for-$68 or 1-for-$43
*Not valid 12/27/11, 12/29/11, 2/21/12, 2/23/12 Cannon Mountain Lift Ticket Prices -

http://www.cannonmt.com/lift_tickets.html

BEST VALUE IN THE EAST!

2011-2012  REGULAR FULL SEASON RATES

2011-2012 ANYDAY Prices
(excludes NH Senior M-F)          Full-Day            Half-Day* Adult (18-64) 68 46 Teen (13-17) / College 55 45 Military** 53 43 Juniors (6-12) 45 35 Seniors (65+) 45 35 Tuckerbrook Area Only Ticket 36 24 NH Senior (65+) Monday - Friday only. FREE FREE Kids 5 & Under*** FREE FREE
